cause.description:
Im serious....snails dont deserve to die!!!SAVE the snail population!!woooohoooo!!!! NO MORE ESCARGOT!!!NO MORE BUTTER!!!NO MORE GARLIC!!!
1. Snails are awsome
2. Snaills are slow and defensless
3. WE need help breeding snails
cause.mission: Stop the killing of inocent snails!
cause.name: SAY NO TO ESCARGOT
